messages.messageBody:
hi all

my name is glenn johnston and i am in australia and i am a writer.
currently i am writting a role play adventure based in japan and with
samurai.

my main focus is the archery side of things if any one can help me out
with this i wouldbe most grateful.

also some history of the classes of people in that time were the
samurai orgins from

reagrds

glenn
